column4: hi folks, is there a way i can remote control my existing X session in my kubuntu laptop to a winxp machine?
have you tried the terminal services client?
uhh.. ubuntu has a terminal server?
have you tried the terminal services client?  <-- note the client
ts client from winxp or ubuntu?
what was your question that i responded?
hi folks, is there a way i can remote control my existing X session in my kubuntu laptop to a winxp machine?
have you tried the terminal services client?  <-- note the client, this was my response
there is a terminal services client on ubuntu
also there is a telnet server that you need to enable on the Windoz side and you can telnet in to the box
but using the telnet off course does not have the gui capabilities
actually trying to connect from win to ubuntu.  my first msg got kinda messed up {g}
you use clients like putty or others with ssh capabilities to log on to ubuntu (telnet in to ubuntu is not recommended)
you're a confusing person, you asking something and you are doing dfferent things
